title: Unmai Oru Naal Vellum Lyrics Lingaa Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Lingaa Unmai Orunaal Vellum Song Lyrics
Lyrics: Vairamuthu
Singers: Haricharan

Unmai orunaal vellum
Indha ulagam un peyar sollum
Indha oorey pottrum
Manidhan neeye neeye
Neeyada neeyada

Poigal por veesum
Aanaal unmai medhuvaai pesum
Andru neeye vazhvil velvaai
Kalangaadhey kalangaadhey
Kalangaadhey, karaiyaadhey
Karaiyadhey kalangaadhey

Sirithuvarum singam undaa
Punnaigaikkum puligal undaa
Uyir kudikkum onaaigal gundu

Pallaththil orr yaanai
Veelindhaalum adhan
Ullaththai veelthivida mudiyadhu.

Unmai orunaal vellum
Indha ulagam un peyar sollum
Indha oorey pottrum
Manidhan neeye neeye
Neeyada neeyada

Poigal por veesum
Aanaal unmai medhuvaai pesum
Andru neeye vazhvil velvaai
Kalangaadhey kalangaadhey
Kalangaadhey, karaiyaadhey
Karaiyadhey kalangaadhey

Suttaalum sangu niram
Eppodhum vellaiyadaa
Maenmakkal ellaarum
Maelmakkal thaaney.

Kettaalum Nam thalaivan
Eppodhum rajanada
Veelndhaalum vallal karam
Veelaadhey thaaney.
